sense.def:
Kar je
beneath another thing
, je pod drugo stvarjo.

seg.quote: She concealed the bottle beneath her mattress.

sense.def:
Če govorimo o nečem, kar je
beneath the surface of something
, govorimo o skritih ali neočitnih vidikih neke stvari.

seg.quote: Beneath the veneer of civilization, he was a very vulgar man.
